node.title: DVA admitted liability for soldier's PTSD 18 months after he took his own life, royal commission told
node.alt: Soldier in uniform with a hat smiles as he holds a dog
node.description: Lance Corporal Ryan Goodwin sought compensation from the Department of Veterans Affairs for his post-traumatic stress disorder in 2018, but by the time the department admitted liability this year he had been dead for 18 months.
node.content:
["When the Department of Veterans' Affairs (DVA) accepted liability for Lance Corporal Ryan Goodwin's post-traumatic stress disorder in June, it was three years after he had lodged the claim and 18\u00a0months after he had taken his own life.", "The Royal Commission into Defence and Veteran Suicide was today told that Mr Goodwin died in December 2019, after a seven-year battle with mental health issues in the aftermath of his service in Afghanistan.", "Mr Goodwin's father Phil Goodwin, and sister Lauren Goodwin, told the Brisbane hearing he \"wasn't supported\" by the DVA.", "They said he was pushed to substance abuse and then eventually suicide to \"numb the pain\" of the horrors he witnessed during his time in the military \u2013 including watching his best friend die in a motorcycle crash at the Enoggera Barracks and attempting to rescue two people from a fuel tanker explosion near Shoalwater Bay.", "\"Ryan was one of the first responders to the situation(s),\" Phil Goodwin told the hearing.", "He said those effects were compounded by the horrors his son witnessed while he was deployed in Afghanistan.", "The commission heard Ryan Goodwin was excited when he enlisted in the armed forces in 2007, wanting to see the world and protect his country.", "\"He was a protector \u2026 fiercely intelligent, very loyal,\" Ms Goodwin said.", "", "
Lance Corporal Goodwin lodged a claim with the DVA in October 2018.(Supplied)
", "But Ms Goodwin said the man who returned from overseas deployment was aggressive, quiet and forgetful.", "\"He had no interest in life. It was definitely a downward spiral, he wasn't the same person he was before,\" she said.", "\"There wasn't any guidance in helping them seek employment outside the army or to see what other skills they could utilise.\"", "Ms Goodwin said the family repeatedly begged her brother to seek help but were \"always met with resistance\".", "\"It was soul-destroying to watch as a family, the begging,\" she said.", "\"It's horrible to watch someone dying before your eyes and knowing there's nothing you can do.\"", "
'Another statistic, another case load'
", "Phil Goodwin said his son lodged a claim for PTSD liability with DVA on October 16, 2018 \u2014 six years after he left the Army.\u00a0", "But he said his son\u00a0was met with barriers and delays.", "The commission heard he was placed on a waiting list and had found it \"adversarial\" that he had to \"prove things to the department\".", "\"He was just a number there. Another statistic, another caseload,\" Mr Goodwin told the royal commission.", "\"Individuals need to take some responsibility for their own welfare, but if Ryan was fit enough, healthy enough to send off to service, then we as a nation had a duty to keep Ryan safe in his own country.\"", "The DVA finally accepted liability on June 16 this year.", "Ms Goodwin said she was with her brother in hospital when he died, holding his hand and pleading with him to make it through \"just one more minute\".", "\"I played Christmas music because I knew he would hate it, hoping he would wake up and say, 'Turn that rubbish off',\" she said.", "Mr Goodwin called for better support networks, tailored support and outreach for veterans \"rather than relying on non-government organisations to provide support, rather than relying on parents to be psychological councillors\".", "\"We need to do more for these men and women of Australia who put their life on the line, particularly in active service,\" he said.", "
'There's an empty seat at our table'
", "Ms Goodwin said she wrote a letter to the Prime Minister after her brother died, hoping to receive some acknowledgement for his achievements.", "The response \u2013 which came months later \u2013 acknowledged the \"tragedy\" of Ryan's death, his \"service to our nation \u2026 bravery and dedication\".", "It also detailed the government's plans to make enquiries into veteran suicides.", "But Ms Goodwin said it felt \"generic\" and \"almost \u2026 cold\".", "\"I just thought you don't really know the loss that we suffer, you sit at home with your family and have Christmas,\" she said.", "\"We didn't really get to have Christmas, there's a empty seat at our table.\""]
